                   The Discworld - a magical realm quite unlike,  
                   yet hauntingly familiar to, ours - has got it&#039;s  
                   first tourist. Rincewind (David Jason), an  
                   inept ex-student wizard is given the task of  
                   guiding Twoflower (Sean Astin) through the city  
                   state of Ankh Morpork. Rincewind has two  
                   problems: firstly, as an expert coward, he  
                   doesn&#039;t feel he&#039;s the best person to guard a  
                   naive - and extremely rich, by local standards  
                   - tourist through one of the roughest cities in  
                   the multiverse. And secondly, the world is  
                   coming to an end. Never rains, eh?    
                                                           
                   The film of The Colour of Magic combines Terry  
                   Pratchett&#039;s best-selling fantasy novels The  
                   Colour of Magic and The Light Fantastic.  
                                                           
                   Oh, and a well-known author appears in a cameo  
                   role.
